title: Smart TicTacToe Android Wear
summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.
description: Smart TicTacToe especially designed for Android Wear.The player which has the first 3 symbols in a line wins the game.Play against the computer or chose the two player mode.Note: The main focus of the first release is on the two-player mode.Coming Soon:- improved artificial intelligence- different levels of difficulty
descriptionHTML:
Smart TicTacToe especially designed for Android Wear.

The player which has the first 3 symbols in a line wins the game.

Play against the computer or chose the two player mode.

Note: The main focus of the first release is on the two-player mode.

Coming Soon:
- improved artificial intelligence
- different levels of difficulty
comments: Good Game. :) Pretty Good. Love the UI. Better than any other Android Wear Tic-Tac-Toe game. Just fix the A.I and this app will get five stars. :) Keep up the good work developer(s).
Bad AI The AI is too easy to beat
Good game I don't like it because cause the player Is toooooooo easy to beat
A classic ... Now on your wrist.
